name: Pheasants Forever: Wingshooter
summary:
Feel the chill in the air and the leaves under your feet as you prepare for the moment. Then suddenly ... a flurry fills the air! 
 
In Pheasants Forever, players have over 20 different types of wild game to hunt, including pheasants, duck, quail & turkey. Pick your favorite breed of hunting dog to be your companion and set out on the hunt either alone or head-to-head with a friend!
